response.overview: The past & present life of Krrish Kaveri aka Kichu, a village boy in a ferry called Panchikkattukadavu who makes all his dreams into reality. All his life turns around the girl he loves and a bridge he has to build. In his childhood on the day of Vishu he executes an adventurous heist with his friends and that changes his life once and for all. Later, as a young man he chases all his goals.
response.title: Vishu
